Title: Natural Born Storyteller
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Mike Weiss, Cole Maliska (executive story editor), Mo Masi (story editor), Ryan Maldonado (story editor), Eduardo Javier Canto (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: Burgess and Roman find the body of an eight-year-old boy while pursuing a gang-banger.
